mapper.select: SELECT raa03b.IB_DEAL_NO , raa03b.RISK_INSPCT_CCD , raa03b.LST_C_CASE_CCD , raa03b.ITEM_SQ , raa03b.BSC_ASTS_KND_CD , raa03b.BSC_ASTS_CNTNT , raa03b.OPN_PRC_VAL_AMT , raa03b.BSC_ASTS_ISNG_CORP_NO , raa03b.INVST_CRNCY_CD , raa03b.CRNCY_AMT , raa03b.APLC_EXCH_R , raa03b.RNMCNO , raa03b.HNDL_DY_TM , raa03b.HNDL_DPRT_CD , raa03b.HNDL_P_ENO , cd.CD_VL_NM AS BSC_ASTS_KND_CD_NM FROM RAA03B raa03b , ( SELECT rb2.CD_VL_ID , rb2.CD_VL_NM from RAA90B rb1 , RAA91B rb2 WHERE rb1.CMNS_CD_GRP = rb2.CMNS_CD_GRP and rb1.CMNS_CD_NM = 'BSC_ASTS_KND_CD' ) cd WHERE 1=1 AND IB_DEAL_NO = #{ibDealNo} AND raa03b.BSC_ASTS_KND_CD = cd.CD_VL_ID ORDER BY ITEM_SQ
